creator: M M infocare
descriptionHtml:
Amigo Company Profile
Amigo Vending machines pvt Ltd a company started on 2012 to serve the best coffee/tea and other beverages to corporate offices, HO RE CA ( Hotels, Restaurants and Cafes) and public places like Airports, Railways, Bus terminals, Hospitals, Colleges and Tourist places, company's managing director Mr Krishnappa is having total experience of 26 years in the field of coffee/tea vending machines,5 years in Amigo Vending Machines pvt ltd as a MD and CEO, and well managing business professional and he is having many business success
The Company : -
Amigo Vending Machines’ mission is to be the leader in introducing innovative, quality coffee vending machines. Through close customer contact and excellent relationships, we will meet the needs of our customers, both in terms of equipment and service. Amigo Vending Machines Pvt. Ltd. is a privately-held company in Bangalore, India. It maintains an office and warehouse in Bangalore.

The Products : -
Amigo Vending Machines will offer imported and domestic coffee vending machines of differing capabilities, depending on the need of the customer. Through our strategic alliances and industry experience, we can offer innovative machines that have functions and advantages not found in today's common vending machines, thus providing Amigo Vending Machines a competitive advantage over more established competitors in India. We plan to aggressively enhance our existing line by pursuing supplier relationships with large international and domestic manufacturers, to give our clients the best possible choices.

Objectives : -
To provide new technology coffee/tea machines to Indian market
Imported WMF coffee machines to Five star Hotels, and corporate offices with good quality coffee/tea for high end customers
Installing Indian Fresh Bean to cup coffee machines with milk cooler for all segment customers with reasonably best prices
Installing Indian Authentic filter coffee/tea machines with Hot milk options for all segments with best prices.
To meet the needs of SME offices coffee,tea we are providing small imported coffee machines at affordable prices.
Mission : -
Amigo Vending Machines’ mission is to be the leader in introducing innovative, quality coffee vending machines to the market. Through close customer contact and excellent relationships, we will strive to surpass our customer’s expectations. Amigo Vending Machines will secure sufficient profits from free cash flow from operations, to sustain its stability and finance future growth. We will add value to our community by maintaining a friendly, familial work environment.
Keys to Success : -
Amigo company introducing new products and providing quality services to customers, we must be focused and work hard to create acceptance for ourselves and our products within the marketplace. The keys to our success are

Provide quality support and service and recognize that Amigo Vending Machines’ success depends most critically on the relationships it's able to create.
Offer innovative, quality products that are able to both expand existing markets and create new ones for our customers.
Steady, disciplined pattern of growth.
Know our customers and constantly work to keep them happy.
title: Amigo India
